page.title: 08AMPNEY MEDICAL MATTERS
page.content: No doctors now live in our block. Nearly everyone goes to a doctor in{ {Cirencester}where there are 4 practices to choose from. The hospital in{Cirencester}does major surgery but no intensive care. Maternity cases go to{Swindon}or{Cheltenham.}The nearest chemist is in{Cirencester}which makes getting prescriptions difficult for those without cars. The Health Visitor visits the school regularly. The school doctor and dentist visit each year. Most children happily go to their own dentist. The area has few health hazards but a growing number are concerned with farm sprays and fumes from American aeroplanes. People are starting again to grow their own vegetables because they think them healthier. Over-indulgence in alcohol has caused 2 or 3 deaths and some illnesses recently.
